notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This research was supported by the Ministry of Science, Innovation, and Universities (MICIU) program numbers AGL2015-63855-C2-1-R and MAT2015-64139-C4-1-R, by the Generalitat Valenciana (GVA) PROMETEO/2018/024 program, and by the EU H2020 projects YPACK (reference number 773872) and ResUrbis (reference number 730349).
